review:
Gerçek R.P.G oyunu ‘Dark Eden’ size daha önce diğer oyunlarda yaşamadığınız yeni bir deneyim sunacak. Vampir'de tipik fantastik dünyadan farklılaşan 'Karanlık Cennet' temalı dünyasına hoş geldiniz.
Başladığınızda, garip yol alma, değişken animasyonlar, gecikme ve benzeri tüm küçük şeyleri fark edeceksiniz, sistemi kaldırmak ve bu güzelliğe bir daha asla dokunmak isteyeceksiniz. Ancak biraz oynadıktan ve bu oyunun sunduğu derinliği ve beraberinde gelen tüm eğlenceyi anladıktan sonra, bağımlısı olacaksınız. Bunu yıllar önce, sunucular bilgisayar korsanları ve benzeri şeylerle doluyken oynuyordum. O günler bitmiş gibi görünüyor. Ayrıca buna benzer başka bir oyun yok. Kesinlikle denemeye değer. Umarız bu oyun, insanlar ve vampirler arasındaki savaşı sürdürmek için yeniden küçük ve kendini adamış bir topluluk oluşturur! :D

review:
[b]Why even bother releasing Dark Eden on Steam only to shut down the servers and not tell anybody!?[/b] The least the publisher, GamenGame, could have done was make an attempt to put the word out that Dark Eden and Dark Eden Origin have been revived. Since it isn’t, these games should be removed from Steam to prevent gamers from downloading a game they cannot even play.

Don’t get me wrong… for being a 20+ year old game with graphics that haven’t aged well for modern hardware and poor translations from Korean to English, the game itself is still one of the best early ARPG’s and MMO’s out there. So, do yourself a favor and [u]don’t bother trying to play this one on Steam[/u]. If you’re a fan of the original Diablo and Diablo 2, you can still enjoy playing this old school gem on private servers, such as DKLegend, Darkeden International, and Darkeden Genesis.

review:
I want to start off by saying, I use to love this game so much.

I was playing back when the game makers abandoned it to the speed/hp hackers, back before the ousters even existed. I was there when the game closed down and reopened under new ownership, and I was there to see this amazing game die.

Such a great game with so much to do and so much to see, is ruined by the fact hardly anyone plays it.

If you are a new starter to this game, don't expect to find friends and teams to level up with, the only people who play now are pretty much maxed and you probably wont even see another player until you level up a lot to get to the areas with them. 

I have been living in hope for the last 15+ years that one day this game would be full and fun again. when I found it on steam, my heart raced. but sadly its just as empty as it has been for years. maybe one day I'll log in and see it full again. If that happens I will change my review. but I just don't see it happening.

review:
-First, Every game has pros and cons. (EVERY game)
And if you want to be good in any free-to-play game you are most likely 
going to be spending a little bit of money as even free-to-play games
need some sort of income to keep things afloat (keeping servers running isn't cheap)
-That being said, the diablo like graphics and dark, creepy horror atmosphere is great
and nostalgic, the skill animations (and there are LOTS!) are well designed and beautiful.
-Though the game lacks direction the content is there, and there are PLENTY very nice
 english-speaking players with huge guilds that will gladly help and guide you along your journey.
-Very cool day-night cycle where slayers or vampires are affected by in-game.
-VERY ACTIVE community, balanced PvP if you stat/gear right
Very unique aspects of the game make the game-play fun and interactive
Would definitely recommend and will continue to play myself.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972593483', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 4480, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2983, 'last_played': 1585406144}
review:
Amazing nostalgia, 10/10 optimization and design of PVP/PVE.

I played the vanilla Darkeden back in the day and it was fun as hell, hackers kind of ruined it though (not an issue here).

Everything seems free now and plenty of fun dungeons to do with a lot of good loot and friendly people willing to help.

There are PVP events and missions that are so populated I was astounded how many people participate and play together to try and win the war and get nice rewards (please add a countdown timer if possible for events).

Two small issues

One. A guide to leveling in game. If you press escape and go to cart you can receive very strong items that will level you to 150 and then you can do the quest to get promoted and continue on leveling/

Two. If you play on dual screens you will probably FPS lag but on one screen it works perfectly.

Thanks for bringing this game back !

author: {'steamid': '76561198066629872', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 3203, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3045, 'last_played': 1482466614}
review:
Fiquei muito nostálgico quando soube do game relançado e agora aqui na steam. Estou jogando e matando saudade pra caramba! O jogo ficou relativamente mais fácil (um pouco mais organizado), mas ainda assim muito divertido!

Não espere gráficos estontetantes, jogabilidade espetacularmente rápida como de um game atual.
 Dark Eden é um MMO isométrico (estilo Diablo 2) extremamente old school, fez muito sucesso no final da década de 90 e foi com certeza um dos games que mais joguei na minha adolescência. E principalmente prova que gráficos não definem o quanto um jogo é bom.

Por que vale a pena jogá-lo:
Ambientação do game excelente (Música, estética do jogo)

PVP aberto: se você gosta de poder em qualquer hora, qualquer lugar entrar em combate contra players de raças diferentes esse game é pra você. Aliás, apesar de ser um game point and click, precisa ter dedo pra ganhar no pvp e saber usar a sua raça e skills.

Variedade de builds e estilo de gameplay (considerando que o jogo é isométrico ele tem bastante ação nos combos)

Sistema dia/noite influencia no seu gameplay como Vampiro ou Slayer e Ouster

Cada raça tem suas próprias mecânicas (jogabilidade, skills etc)

Exemplo:
Vampiros ficam com visibilidade reduzida de dia e mais fracos, de noite isso é o oposto. Por natureza regeneram HP, suas skills usam o próprio sangue e ganham XP em dobro quando sugam uma vítima (ganham XP matando o monstro), Tem 2 classes (definidas apenas pelas skills que você escolhe usar e os stats (STR DEX INT) que você investe).

Slayers tem 5 classes (Sworder, Blader, Healer, Enchanter e Gunner), tem visibilidade reduzida de noite, não regeneram HP sozinhos (tem que usar poção ou gear com hp steal). Se forem mordidos por um vampiro tem que tomar um antídoto pra não se transformarem. Porém, ganham xp POR HIT e isso é bem legal, porque cobre as vantagens naturais que os Vampiros e Ousters tem sobre Slayers que são humanos

Ousters são ninfas elementais (apenas sexo feminino), tem 4 classes diferentes e cada uma tem uma árvore de habilidades bastante variada: Melee usando um Chakram e as outras todas elementais (Earth, Fire, Water), cada uma com um estilo de gameplay, inclusive podendo mesclar duas skill tree diferentes (mas pra fazer isso, saiba o que está fazendo). 

Não posso dar muito mais detalhes pois faz muito tempo que joguei com as outras raças e meu conhecimento maior é de Vampiros mesmo. I was actually enjoying the game until my frames were dipping so low I couldn't use my mouse enough to sell at the shop. I have a brand new gaming pc I bought early this year so i'm assuming this has something to do with the game/server, but if anyone knows how to fix it please let me know.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048493163', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 8, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1481254701}
review:
지역벤을 시켰나 한국IP에서 접속이 안되는듯?

다 필요없고 한국섭 기준으로 이게임은 현질안하면 사냥하기도 존나게 힘든 게임. 

승직 스킬을 배우는데 재료(원본서)와 기여도의 엄청난 노가다가 요구되며, 스킬을 배우지 않으면 렙업 사냥에 지장이 생길정도로 막대한 영향력을 선사함.  게다가 특정레벨(1차승직 오시리스~토트)이 되고나서 특정 아이템을 맞추지 못하면 동렙대 사냥터에서 몹 한마리도 잡기힘들 정도로 사냥이 불가능하다. 문제는 이 스팀판 다덴에서 아이템을 퍼주지 않는이상 그 특정 스펙의 아이템을 맞추는게 무자본으로 할시에 엄청나게 힘들다. 또한 그 특정아이템을 만드려면 스텟2개붙은 레어템을 구하거나, 캐시아이템인 블루 크리스탈로 옵션을 만들어야한다...  

그리고 승직퀘스트는 암걸릴정도로 난이도가 어렵고, 특히 2차승직 퀘스트같은경우 슬레이어 힐계열 직업군은 아는 지인격수가 없으면 애초당시 키우지말자. 승직퀘스트 하다가 암걸린다.

pvp는 총슬(Gun) 덱뱀이 최강이며, 엄청난 회피력과 명중으로 상대방의 공격을 씹어버릴수있다. 특히 총슬 뎀크셋(데미지+크리티컬)의 게이볼그는 힘이나 인트계열 직업군을 바보로 만들정도로 존나게 쌔다 (윽윽 거리면서 뒤로 밀리다 아무것도 못하고 죽을정도), 물론 인트계열 뱀파이어는 pve와 타종족 pvp는 끝내주게 좋다. 결국pve, 동족pvp, 타종족 pvp 전부 성능이 좋은 덱스계열 직업군이 넘사벽으로 쌘 게임이다.

검슬은 쓰레기중에 쓰레기이며, 총슬에 비해서 템세팅 비용이 두배나 들면서 효율은 엄청 떨어진다.(스킬 이펙트는 멋있다) 올힘 능력치 뱀파이어는 애초당시 키우지말자. 데미지는 쌔나 후반에 몬스터를 명중률이 부족해서 때리지도못하고 고기방패마냥 맞다가 죽는다. 물론 pvp도 마찬가지다. 이렇게 보니 힘 스텟에 대한 밸런스가 아주 개판이다. (물론 명중 보정된 도슬은 예외로 하자)

운영방식은 기득권세력 유저들의 갑질 횡포(사냥터 통제, 강제적인 동족 pvp로 인한 지속적인 괴롭힘 이하 무필)를 방관하며, "유저들 끼리의 문제"라고 일관하면서 방치한다. 국내섭이 이러한 문제점 때문에 신규유저가 적고, 매니아인 올드유저밖에 없다.

결국은 무자본으로 하기 엄청 힘든게임이며, 스팀판에서 이러한 구조들이 변하기 전까지 아무리 스팀으로 게임을 런칭해도 신규유저들은 못견디고 떠날것이다. 

한 때 다크에덴을 13년 넘게 즐겼던 유저로서 평가를 달고 떠난다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198024194237', 'num_games_owned': 264, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 457, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 244, 'last_played': 1524741760}
review:
[h1]PLEASE, DON'T MIND ALL THE KIDS DOING BAD REVIEWS ON THIS GAME.[/h1] 

Dark Eden is and has always been a free to play MMORPG, [b]released in 1997[/b]. The game may have not aged that well, but please, it's a classic and should be treated as such. It doesn't deserve all the bad ratings it has here on Steam. 

You may have to Run the game as Admin or Compatibility Mode. Once you open the game, adjust your video and game options (will be applied when you restart the game), and to  create your account just click on the button once inside the login menu of the game - it will forward you to their website via Steam. I actually didn't have any problem at all running this game, neither any of my friends.

The game still feels and plays just like any other old school game of this genre, such as Ultima, etc. I was happy and suprised to find some of the cities and even training zones with an interesting amount of people walking around there and interacting with each other.

Dark Eden went through ups and downs and some dubious updates, while some people complained that things are too easy now, others like my brother and I just loved the fact that the game will hook you up with some goodies from the start, and interesting dungeon zones to level up and fight with other races. 

In the end, it's still an weird old atmosphere and enjoyable F2P game. And to all my dear Steam friends, please be honest with your reviews - if you don't like games of this old style, why are you playing it on the first place? This game has done nothing wrong to deserve such a bad rating.

review:
Bom vamos lá pessoal, oque dizer sobre o Dark Eden:

Breve Resumo :

Dark Eden é um MMORPG de Caçadores e Vampiros, publicado em 1997 (Sim, 1997!!)

Com gráficos isométricos, ao estilo do Diablo Original, o jogo se passa em ambientes escuros e sangrentos, possuindo diversos cenários com baixa luminosidade, resumindo: sem frescuras!

O jogo possui 3 raças: Slayer, Vampire e Ousters aonde cada uma possui uma jogabilidade completamente diferente da outra.
Um dos pontos mais fortes do Dark Eden é de fato PvP em mundo aberto, devido ao motivo das raças estarem sempre em guerra entre si,ou seja, não existe trégua para fugir quando você encontrar um vampiro boladão querendo morder seu pescoço!

O jogo é extremamente nostálgico, principalmente pra galera que teve a oportunidade de jogar o jogo quando estava no seu auge.

Recomendo o game pra quem curte um bom MMORPG clássico, e não se incomoda com os gráficos antigos!

Análise:

Pontos Positivos:

* Sistema de Dia/Noite que influência nas Vantagens/Desvantagens entre as raças.
* 3 Raças diferentes, que mudam completamente a jogabilidade do jogo entre cada uma.
* Excelente sistema de PVP em mundo aberto, com grandes guerras entre as raças.
* Um dos RPG's isométricos mais antigos do mercado.

Pontos Negativos:

* Apesar do game ser antigo, a jogabilidade não é das melhores quando comparada até mesmo aos clássicos da época como Diablo 1.
* Suporta pouquíssimas resoluções, com resolução máxima de 1280 x 1024.

Caso queiram dar uma olhada no jogo, segue a análise comentada !

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B59EF5zeO84&feature=youtu.be

review:
Before I start the review, I just want to address the issues other reviewers were having with graphics- I had the same problems.  Not sure why, but I had to wait to be in game to change the aspect ratio, exit, and return.  Dont mash buttons on startup like I do- it crashses.  TL;DR at bottom.  Onward!

I just want to say first and foremost- I tried REALLY hard to like this game.  The graphics are right in the Diablo II vein and that really hits home for me.  There are three different races, each with a different playstyle and abilities, story, zone etc.  Within that, there are many ways to customize each character.  I was not assaulted by ads, micro-transactions, or pay to win schemes.  What could possibly be wrong with this game you ask?

1. Engrish.  Seriously. Normally I can look past it, but in this case it actually makes tutorials and storyline downright impossible to understand.  

2. Community.  There's one server, and its abandoned. Ill assume this is due to the vatious issues Ive encountered.

3. Controls.  I tried one character that was a melee vampire- no real issues.  When it came to the human Gunner, good luck.  Trying to move away from the enemies whilst also trying to click on them to attack is nearly impossible.  It just doesnt have the responsivness that D2 or even the original Diablo had.

4. Guidance.  This game litterally drops you in the middle of nowhere with no idea of where you ar eor what you should be doing.  Once you do figure out where to get a quest started, the 'fun' is just beginning.  I was hoping to find someone around to help, but, see issue 2.

TL;DR Dont do it.  Lots of potential, but it wil just make you rage quit and be sad you wasted the GB. :'(

review:
First off let me say, please ignore the negative reviews, I have read through them and fail to see a reason for a negative review when 100% of their reasons are technical in nature, not game based.

I have been playing this game on and off since 2008.  Once it launched on steam, I clicked to download the game, once downloaded, launched the game, clicked at the bottom "new id" a page appears to enter your email, check it, then add a password and verify your password and bam, your in the game.

Ok so about the game and why would anyone want to play something created back in 2006 or so.  Well first off there is nothing else like it on the internet, nothing.  Imagine a game where  there are three races locked into an eternal conflict.  You can choose to be a vampire, a slayer, or an ouster.

Vampires are creatures powered by darkness.  They can weild strong magic, powerful melee attacks, and drain their prey of blood to restore the vampires health.  They are very strong solo players, but work well in a group also.

Slayers are humans with varried classes.  You have the two handed sworder called a Blader.  There is the sword and board class called a Sworder.  A modern weapon master using shotguns, sub machine guns, Assault rifles, and Sniper rifles called a Gunner.  Then you have a magic using Healer able to call down powerfull light based magic to crush your enemies and also resurect your fallen commrads.  Last but not least is the Enchanter, a character that uses powerful light based magic to crush, capture,  and destory its enemies.  The Slayer race is not as powerful solo as the other races, but in a group, it is the most powerful race in the game.

Ousters are a faiiry like race of all females.  They are magical creatures of nature.  They can choose to master the power of the elements to harness very powerful magical attacks or to be a master of combat,tempering your attacks with the power of the elements.  

These three races live in a time of constant battle with each other.  There are many different wars that occur on a daily basis now.  Some wars pit every race against each other, and other wars that make temporary allies of one of the races to unite against the third race.  There is an in depth quest line to advance your character to stronger and higher stages.  There are also many other quests to keep any role player busy.  You have the ability on all races to capture, raise, modify and blend alot of different pets.  Pets add attributes to your character, they can assist you in combat, and race specific pets will actually help you fight your enemies.

You can enchant the gear you find, and use Articles to create even more powerful items.  There are alot of bosses to hunt in the game, but bring your friends, because they can be very deadly.  There always seems to be some kind of event going on, giving you free items to help you build your character.

Even though this game has been around since 2006 or so, this game is still seeing new content added.  At the time of this review new content was added just yesterday.

In summary if your looking for a unique free to play game, where fantasy is the catch word, and you dont mind older yet unique graphics, give it a try.  What do you have to loose, its a f2p.

I hope this was helpful and that we see you in game some time.

Cya folks!

É um excelente jogo com mt PVP. O que talvez esteja prejudicando seja a questão do jogo não aceitar resoluções que são comuns hoje em dia. Ou joga em janela ou joga ele levemente esticado. Muita gente tem reclamado dos seus gráficos que de fato é datado. Minha maior experiência no jogo está ao fato de ser um velho jogador e agora com ele surgindo na Steam fiquei muito feliz para poder reviver uma época e fato, o jogo NÃO É ENJOATIVO, então dê uma chance se vc curte esse tipo de jogo.

O jogo consta com três raças: Vampiros, Slayers (Humanos), e Ousters que são um tipo de híbrido, para mim sempre se pareceu mais com fada haha. E lembrar que quando eu comecei a jogar não havia Ousters. O jogo sabe ligar muito bem as pontas da história entre as três raças, com interação, jogabilidade, história. No chat uma raça não consegue entender a outra no canal do chat. Até dá para identificar algumas coisas mas em geral as três raças não se entendem.

O ponto alto do jogo é justamente o PVP principalmente entre as raças. Ocorrem guerras grandiosas, difíceis, com momentos organizados e outros de pura bagunça e traição, mas em geral as raças conseguem se organizar bem para participarem da guerra.

Eu agora verei quais são as principais diferenças entre as antigas versões que eu joguei, como Internacional, Japonês e Koreano, e agora esse que novamente é Internacional.

PS: Não se enganem, mesmo q o launcher apareça algo em coreano, o jogo está em inglês. Tudo está em inglês e o único limitador para vc, jogador, será saber inglês.

Aproveite o jogo e nos vemos por lá.

review:
Time to Edit my review! FIRST OF ALL:

 DON'T PAY ATTENTION TO ALL THE NEGATIVE REVIEWERS!

They are compaining about little nitpicky things that can all be solved by asking a simple question or two, or asking for help in general when it's needed.

DarkEden is a horror based MMORPG set in the fictional European country of Eslania, which is caught up in a massive, three-way war between Vampires, Vampire Hunters (Slayers), and Half-Human/Half-Vampire hybrids (Ousters). It's a click-to-move old school styled game complete with 2D isometric graphics and everything - but don't let that fool you; it has many features of a modern MMO (party system, guild system, etc) and has been receiving regular updates for the almost 20 years it's been out.

This game is one of those "I always end up coming back to it" games; I have played dozens and dozens of different MMOs and this one is the one I can never fully quit. The gameplay and style of the game itself has always stood out to me as something that I have never been able to find anywhere else, and it is actually really well balanced end-game. But enough about that.. let me give you some of the details

Three Races You can choose between Slayers, Vampires, and Ousters. Without going too much into the lore, these three factions strive for nothing more than the complete and total destruction of the other two. Each race has distinct leveling and skill system, and the classes found within each race are pretty unique as well. A quick run-down of the three races:

Slayers: Slayers can be one of five classes: Blade, Sword, Gun, Enchant, and Heal. Blade/Sword are two different twists on your melee classes. First one hits heavy and hard, the other hits lighter and more quickly. Gunners are your best DPS class (you can choose between different types of guns ranging from SMGs to Sniper Rifles). Enchant is your magic DPS + buff class. Healer should be self explanatory.

Vampires: Vampires are segmented into two main classes: melee (combat) and magic. Melee/combat vampires get up close and personal and absolutely decimate anything within range. Magic vampires employ a variety of different classes of magic (poison, curses, acid, and blood) to beat down and render their opponent defenseless and useless before they get beaten down.

Ousters: Ousters can be one of four classes: Fire, Water, Earth, and Combat. Fire ousters have some of the highest DPS in the game across all races. Water ousters are the healers for the ouster race, utilizing water magic to restore and buff allies. Earth ousters are the crowd control/buff class and a good earth on any team will make them vastly harder to kill. Combats are your melee class and pull from the three elemental schools - fire, water, and earth - to apply bonus effects and damage to their skills.

One of the great things about this game is that each and every class available is 100% viable in both PvP and PvE. Even the support classes can handle themselves. While characters always work better in a group, soloing is possible if you need/want to do it.

The game is PvP focused, with there only being about 2-3 safezones for each race in the entire game -- everywhere else is PvP enabled with no restrictions. There are also a variety of events and dungeons that take place that encourage PvP between the races. One of the most iconic events is Bible War: twice a week, all three races duke it out across 10 different maps (including two castles for each race) to take control of Blood Bibles, which are equippable buffs with huge benefits. I have never really found any sort of war system in an MMO quite like Bible War on DarkEden. There are also guild seige wars, base occupation wars, wars out in field maps, capture the flag events, and a variety of dungeons and lairs that players can attend. Most of those encourage PvP and will only activate once a single race occupies it; others require the races to work together to defeat a common enemy.

The item and enchanting system is simple to grab the basics of but can get really in-depth if you want to get the most out of your set. The highest levels of gear and equipment can only be obtained by participating in end-game dungeons and events. There is a pretty complex pet system as well. In this game, pets do not help you kill things - they simply give you stats. The stats that you get depend on both the pet and its tier/level; the upgrade system for pets has just recently been updated and there's a lot that goes into it. Much like the item enchanting system, it's easy to get the basics of, but if you really want the most out of your pet you have to work at it.

The number of dungeons, PvP events, regular world PvP in and of itself, the enchantment system, and other stuff I didn't mention are just some of the really cool things about this game. And while I have seen similar mechanics in other MMOs, nothing really has ever been able to top this game. Quite a number of people I've met on the server so far are people who played ~10 years ago and couldn't get over the game - they had to come back.

The Steam revies are mixed at the moment, and that is a combination of some slight technical issues with the client (have to run it in 16 bit color mode on certain configurations of win7/10) and the fact that there are not a lot of English guides for this game - however, over at the Discord channel for this game we are in the process of putting out guides for everything, as well as answering any questions someone might have. And a number of us are working on a complete and total guide for the game itself, so it's only a matter of time.

I'm pretty confident that if this sort of game sounds good to you, you won't be able to quit either. If you have any questions about the game before you try it, please feel free to stop by the Discord channel listed below or comment/PM me on here!

Gameplay: 8-9/10 It's focused primarily around it's PVP combat, which makes this games charm a lot of fun, don't let the low levels put you off of the game, ask for help and we'll get you up to pace.

Graphics: 4-5/10 A bit old, but they have a unique charm to them. And I would say for a 20 year old game they are not too shabby.

Story: 7-8/10 The story of the game is sort of like Dark Souls you can't exactly see the whole story throughout cutscenes in game or have it spoonfed to you like most games, but it's there and it's nice when you understand the whole concept.

In the end don't totally give up on the game if you are stuck or lost when you first start, there are lots of helpful people that are willing to give it their all to make this game more fun for you, but be careful there are always people from other races/factions who want to ruin you day, but that's part of what gives this game it's charm. This game did WoW faction/race vs. Faction/race before WoW even existed.
